sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SIÚT, or Asyút (Asioot), more correctly Osyút, a town of Upper Egypt, and southern terminus of the railway on the left bank of the Nile, by which it is 229 miles from Búlák Dakrúr. The population is about 25,000. See Egypt, vol. vii. p. 775.
